page.title: 13A FAMILY DAY IN SETTLE
page.content: In the morning my Mum gets up first and then my Dad and then my sister and I get up last.I get up at 7:30 . Mum comes and gets us up and then we get dressed.It takes me and my sister a long time to get dressed.Then we go downstairs and have breakfast.I have Weetabix,the same as my sister.We have them with milk and sugar on.Then we go to school at 9:00.We do maths,reading and some topic.Then we have our dinner.When we have had it we go out. We play lots of games like football,skipping and tig and then we go in.We do art and craft until the bell goes and then we go out to break.When we come in again we have story.Before we go home we have prayer.Mum comes and gets me.When we get home we go and see Dad at work.We go and play with our friends and see the cows.Then we go in for tea.
